cc.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used in a business letter or email to show that you are sending a copy to someone else
cc.translation[0].definitions[0].example: To Neil Fry, cc: Anthea Baker, Matt Fox
cc.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: the abbreviation of cubic centimetre or cubic centimetres
cc.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: used on letters, documents, and E-MAILs to show that a copy has also been sent to someone in addition to the person to whom it is addressed
cc.translation[1].definitions[0].example: To Neil Fry, cc Anthea Baker, Matt Fox
cc.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: to send a copy of a letter, document, or E-MAIL addressed to one person to another person
cc.translation[2].definitions[0].example: Can you send a memo to Bill and cc it to the sales team.
